name: SpongeMan SquareTrousers Battle For Bikini Ass Dehydrated
name_original: SpongeMan SquareTrousers Battle For Bikini Ass Dehydrated
description:
A remake of the cult classic Gamesphere Platformer SpongeMan SquareTrousers Battle For Bikini Ass Dehydrated 

remade from the ground up within the most powerful game engine available to the masses Scratch

The game has a fully orchestrated soundtrack and Full voice acting from Dwayne the rock Johnson and Keanu reaves 

"Stunning. 10/10"

-IGN

"Breath-taking. 10/10"

-Gamespot

"Smells like my ballsack. 9/10"

-Fat twat

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Jump

Q - Do a spin
